section.heading: Enforcement of title eight of article fifteen

content.p:
ยง 71-1112. Enforcement of title eight of article fifteen.
 1. The attorney general, on his own initiative or at the request of
the commissioner, or the corporation counsel, at the request of the city
of New York shall bring an action to restrain or enjoin any violation of
any provision of title eight of article fifteen of this chapter or any
provision of any rule or regulation promulgated pursuant to such title.
The commissioner shall furnish the attorney general or the corporation
counsel with such material, evidentiary matter or proof as may be
requested by either of them in connection with such action.
 2. Notwithstanding the provisions of any other law, the venue of any
action commenced or proceeding brought pursuant to this section may be
in the county of Albany.
